original_text: From the firstborn of the people of Israel he took the money, 1,365 shekels, by the shekel of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손의 처음 태어난 자에게서 받은 돈이 성소의 세겔로 천삼백육십오 세겔이라

sentences.original_text: From the firstborn of the people of Israel he took the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 백성의 장자들에게서 돈을 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: by the shekel of the sanctuary
